name: Toy Egg Surprise 2 - More Free Toy Collecting Fun!
name_original: Toy Egg Surprise 2 - More Free Toy Collecting Fun!
description:
Toy Egg Surprise 2 brings you more yummy chocolate eggs to eat and more super cool toys to collect!

Toy Egg Surprise 2 is a free super fun Toy collecting game where every day will feel like your birthday as you get as much yummy chocolate and toy surprises as you can open!



Drop a coin into the all new toy egg surprise machine and bingo, watch your yummy chocolate egg bounce down like a pinball! Claw up your exciting new candy egg and rip off the foil and eat all that delicious candy chocolate so your left with your egg surprise, pop it open to reveal like by magic a brand new toy prize, Jackpot!

You also get your very own toy collectors room where you can show off all your cool new toys to your family and friends. Can you collect them all.

There are 50 different toy prizes to collect including:
Toy soccer stars, toy tamago monsters, Super cute toy animals, emergency rescue vehicles, cute dress up dolls, superhero figures, handheld games and much more!

If you love watching toy surprise egg opening videos online you will love this app!

Toy Egg Surprise 2 is great fun for all ages and suitable for both boys and girls.
